Class DelimiterAwareApplicationContext

  • java.lang.Object

    public class DelimiterAwareApplicationContext
extends DeferPlaceholderFileSystemXmlWebApplicationContext
    Version of DeferPlaceholderFileSystemXmlWebApplicationContext which does not necessarily assume that file list are space separated.
